articles.author: Rediff.com
articles.title: It seemed after 2022 World Cup I was retiring, but now...: Messi - Rediff.com
articles.description: Argentina captain Lionel Messi is not thinking about his international future beyond next year's Copa America, where he will try to lead the country to a second successive continental title at the tournament in the United States.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Lionel Messi is not ruling out playing the 2026 World Cup. Photograph: Kai Pfaffenbach/Reuters 
Argentina captain Lionel Messi is not thinking about his international future beyond next year'… [+1993 chars]
